structured.description: A Web App using the Sanic web framework that transcribes audio files and displays a summary of the conversation in real-time. It uses the Weaviate API for real-time transcription and stores the data in a MySQL database. The app also includes a stop button to end the transcription process.

items.description: Queries a database, retrieves transcription data for multiple speakers and segments, sorts the data based on timestamp, and displays each entry as a markdown table with speaker, segment, summary, and timestamp.
items.name: fetch_and_display_data
